entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
